exhibition.description: Ha Chong-Hyun 개인전은 작가의 50년 예술 여정을 조망하는 전시로, 약 30점의 작품을 통해 '회화란 무엇인가?'라는 근본적 질문을 탐구합니다. 작가의 독창적인 '배압법(bae-ap-bub)' 기법으로 제작된 Conjunction 및 Post-Conjunction 시리즈를 중심으로, 물감의 물질적 속성과 색채의 점진적 변화를 실험한 작품들을 선보입니다.
exhibition.description_en: This solo exhibition examines Ha Chong-Hyun's 50-year artistic journey through approximately 30 works, exploring the fundamental question 'What is painting?' The exhibition features works from the Conjunction and Post-Conjunction series, created using the artist's unique 'bae-ap-bub' (back pressure method) technique, demonstrating experimental approaches to paint's material properties and color gradation.

artists.name: Ha Chong-Hyun
career_highlights: Former Dean of Fine Arts at Hongik University
Former Director of Seoul Museum of Art
artists.artistic_technique: bae-ap-bub (back pressure method) - pushing paint through canvas from behind

exhibition.curatorial_statement: Explores 'What is painting?' through examination of paint's material properties and the artist's continuous experimentation with oil paint

techniques.name: bae-ap-bub
techniques.description: Pushing paint through hemp cloth from behind to create unique textures and color effects
